sourcesContent:
import React ,{useEffect} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' export default function Update(){ const {id}=useParams(); const[values,setValues ]=useState({ id :id, name:'', price:'' }) useEffect(()=>{ axios.get( 'http ://localhost :3000/fetch'+id) .then(res => {setValues({...values,name :res.data.name,price:res.data.price})} ) .catch(err =>console.log(err))} ,[]) return(
Name
Price


) }
